EmailTemplate.name: WP - Case Study Offer
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Study: Canon USA Fully Automates with VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Click below to learn how you, like Canon® U.S.A. could fully automate your datacenter to maximize performance and efficiency! <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/VMTurbo-Canon-USA-Success-Story-FINAL1.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=cs_offer>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
There are many case studies out there, but every once in a great while, a case study is written that changes the face of case study history. This is that case study. "VMTurbo allowed us to completely automate our vMotions and storage vMotions" This case study shows just how VMTurbo will maximize performance and utilization in your datacenter just as it does for Canon® U.S.A. As Data Center Operations Manager, Sean Hendershot, explains, Canon® was able to safely accommodate 108% YoY workload growth levering VMTurbo's out-of-the-box decision automation. Read now to learn the whole story. Your IT control system, VMTurbo
<http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/VMTurbo-Canon-USA-Success-Story-FINAL1.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=cs_offer>
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
